# Scabbard of Keen Edges
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 5th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 16,000 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

This scabbard can shrink or enlarge to accommodate any knife, dagger, sword, or similar weapon up to and including a greatsword. Up to three times per day on command, the scabbard casts *[[Keen Edge (Spell)|keen edge]]* on any blade placed within it.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Keen Edge (Spell)|keen edge]]*

**Cost** 8,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 529
